name: local-voice-mcp_synthesize_text
description: Convert text to speech with optional voice cloning using reference audio. Supports prosody controls for exaggeration and configuration weight.

text.description: The text to convert to speech. Must be non-empty and under the character limit.

referenceAudio.description: Optional path to reference audio file for voice cloning.

exaggeration.description: Voice style exaggeration level (0.0 to 2.0, default: 0.2).

cfg_weight.description: Configuration weight for TTS model (0.0 to 5.0, default: 1.0).

name: local-voice-mcp_play_audio
description: Play an audio file using the system's default audio player with optional volume control and file cleanup. Supports WAV and MP3 formats. Files must be in the temporary directory for security.

audioFile.description: Path to the audio file to play. Must be a .wav or .mp3 file in the temporary directory.

volume.description: Playback volume as a percentage (0-100). If not specified, uses CHATTERBOX_PLAYBACK_VOLUME environment variable or default of 50.

deleteAfterPlay.description: Whether to delete the audio file after playback completes (success or failure). Default: false. Useful for cleaning up temporary audio files.

name: local-voice-mcp_tts_status
description: Get the current status of the TTS service, including operational state and capabilities.
